about_the_game:
Welcome to StockSim – the ultimate trading simulation game that brings the thrill of the stock market to your fingertips!

Immerse yourself in the world of trading:
Step into the shoes of a world class trader and navigate the fast-paced world of financial markets. Make strategic decisions, analyze market trends, and watch your portfolio grow. With realistic market simulations and dynamic pricing, every trade counts. Can you beat the market?

Whether you're a seasoned trader or a novice just starting out, StockSim offers an engaging and educational experience that will keep you coming back for more. Test your trading skills, make your mark in the financial world, and become a legend in StockSim!

Get ready to trade smart and thrive in StockSim!
detailed_description:
Welcome to StockSim – the ultimate trading simulation game that brings the thrill of the stock market to your fingertips!

Immerse yourself in the world of trading:
Step into the shoes of a world class trader and navigate the fast-paced world of financial markets. Make strategic decisions, analyze market trends, and watch your portfolio grow. With realistic market simulations and dynamic pricing, every trade counts. Can you beat the market?

Whether you're a seasoned trader or a novice just starting out, StockSim offers an engaging and educational experience that will keep you coming back for more. Test your trading skills, make your mark in the financial world, and become a legend in StockSim!

Get ready to trade smart and thrive in StockSim!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or newer (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: StockSim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
